generic_name: ASCORBIC ACID, THIAMINE, RIBOFLAVIN, NIACINAMIDE, PYRIDOXINE, FOLIC ACID, COBALAMIN, BIOTIN, PANTOTHENIC ACID, ZINC
adverse_reactions: ADVERSE REACTIONS Allergic sensitizations have been reported following oral administration of folic acid. Consult your physician immediately if adverse side effects occur.
contraindications: CONTRAINDICATIONS This product is contraindicated in patients with known hypersensitivity to any of the ingredients.
dosage_administration: DOSAGE AND ADMINISTRATION Take one tablet per day or as directed by your physician, orally.
indications: INDICATIONS AND USAGE Dialyvite with Zinc is a prescription folic acid supplement with Zinc and additional nutrients indicated for use in improving the nutritional status of renal dialysis patients.
